member.response: Returns the requested data.
An internal update is still in progress.

member.remarks: The property name is a CamelCase name.

member.response: Returns the requested data.
If the property is invalid.
If the property cannot be found.
If the property is not readable.
An internal update is still in progress.
If an error or an unexpected exception occurs.
If the update procedure was unsuccessful.

member.summary: Writes a single KWLEC200 property.
member.remarks: The property name is a CamelCase name.
